long_description: From a ride on the plane to a day at the beach or dinner with the in-laws, the wicking, quick-drying Merrell Grafton Shirt offers casual, versatile style. Lightweight polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries fast to keep you comfortable while on the go. With a UPF 20 rating, fabric provides good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Features snaps on the front placket and at the chest pocket. The Merrell Grafton Shirt has a bias-cut shoulder panel for style. Closeout.
short_description: From a ride on the plane to a day at the beach or dinner with the in-laws, the wicking, quick-drying Merrell Grafton Shirt offers casual, versatile style.
